Judul: WINTER 2006 Esoteric Art Confronting the Public Eye: The Abstract Spirit Drawings of Georgiana Houghton
Abstrak: The article criticizes the abstract drawings of Georgiana Houghton. A background on Houghton as an artist and a Spiritualitist is presented. Her designs, known as sacred symbolism, deal with ideas about Christianity. Her watercolors were didactic objects that bore the burden of teaching others about Spiritualism.
Sumber: Victorian Studies. Winter2006, Vol. 48 Issue 2, p221-232. 12p
